mapper.select: /* ReservationNoticeSendDAO.reservationNoticeList */ select a.notice_no , a.notice_type , a.notice_parent_no , a.title , a.reg_user_no , b.user_name as reg_user_name , case when a.notice_type = '002' then a.notice_parent_no when a.notice_type = '003' then (select hakwon_no from tb_hakwon_class where class_no = a.notice_parent_no) end as hakwon_no , case when a.notice_type = '002' then '' when a.notice_type = '003' then a.notice_parent_no end as class_no , case when a.notice_type = '002' then (select hakwon_name from tb_hakwon where hakwon_no = a.notice_parent_no) when a.notice_type = '003' then (select hakwon_name from tb_hakwon_class x, tb_hakwon y where x.class_no = a.notice_parent_no and x.hakwon_no = y.hakwon_no) end as hakwon_name , case when a.notice_type = '002' then '' when a.notice_type = '003' then (select class_title from tb_hakwon_class where class_no = a.notice_parent_no) end as class_name , (select concat(device_token, '|', device_type, '|', is_production) from tb_login_hist where user_no = a.reg_user_no and device_token is not null order by login_date desc limit 1) as send_user_device from tb_notice a , tb_user_info b where a.reservation_yn = 'Y' and a.notice_type in ('002', '003') and a.reservation_date <= now() and a.reservation_send_date is null and a.content_status = '001' and a.reg_user_no = b.user_no order by a.notice_no asc

/* ReservationNoticeSendDAO.receiverUserDeviceList */ select b.receive_user_no as user_no , c.device_token , c.device_type , c.is_production from tb_message_receiver b , tb_login_hist c where b.message_no = #{message_no} and b.receive_user_no = c.user_no and c.device_token is not null order by c.device_type
mapper.update: /* ReservationNoticeSendDAO.noticeSendDone */ update tb_notice set reservation_send_date = now() , reg_date = now() where notice_no in (${noticeNos})
mapper.select: /* ReservationNoticeSendDAO.hakwonMemberDeviceList */ select x.device_token , x.device_type , x.is_production from tb_login_hist x , tb_hakwon_member a where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and a.user_no = x.user_no and x.device_token is not null

/* ReservationNoticeSendDAO.classStudentDeviceList */ select x.device_token , x.device_type , x.is_production from tb_login_hist x , tb_hakwon_class_student a where a.class_no = #{class_no} and a.student_user_no = x.user_no and x.device_token is not null

/* ReservationNoticeSendDAO.classParentDeviceList */ select x.device_token , x.device_type , x.is_production from tb_login_hist x , ( select distinct b.parent_user_no from tb_hakwon_class_student a , tb_student_parent b where a.class_no = #{class_no} and a.student_user_no = b.student_user_no ) y where y.parent_user_no = x.user_no and x.device_token is not null
